title: Matchsafe, "Seated Hindu Goddess", late 19th century
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, featuring raised decoration of Eastern Indian goddess seated on undecorated shield, surrounded by swirling foliate motifs. Reverse features goddess standing next to palm tree. Female with upraised arms on lid, as well as bottom. Lid hinged on side. Striker on each vertical side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Seated Hindu Goddess", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-1208.
